main_definition: Relating to space or the physical dimensions of an area.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Involving three-dimensional space and objects within it.
meanings_and_examples.example: The architect designed a spatial layout for the new building.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Relating to or concerning one's perception of space, including directional cues and distance.
meanings_and_examples.example: She has excellent spatial awareness when driving in heavy traffic.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Pertaining to the study of objects in relation to each other within a given area or volume.
meanings_and_examples.example: The art professor taught her students about the importance of spatial relationships in sculpture.
